title: Exclusive Love
overview: Wang Zhan , a timid, ghost-fearing successor of a funeral service company, meets Tang Du Zhi, a top-tier funeral director. As Tang puts him through rigorous training, their relationship unexpectedly deepens despite the challenges. Meanwhile, heartbroken wedding planner Zhang Yi Qing is tasked with organizing a wedding for his long-time crush, Tu Jing He, all while secretly planning to sabotage it! Between the events of funerals and weddings, these four characters confront past wounds and misunderstandings, redefining love and life in the process.
